snippet: SCHWARTZ--Lawrence. We mourn the death of Larry. Beloved husband of Selma. Devoted father of Andrew and Robby (deceased). Caring Papa to Ricky and Julia. Special friend to Leslie, Stefanie and Nikki. The intelligent, courageous, generous patriarch of our family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHWARTZ--Lawrence. We mourn the death of Larry. Beloved husband of Selma. Devoted father of Andrew and Robby (deceased). Caring Papa to Ricky and Julia. Special friend to Leslie, Stefanie and Nikki. The intelligent, courageous, generous patriarch of our family. 1/3
